ygData.subject: Re: Plate/Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... you ... world ... local ... Patrick, I am so glad to hear you say that!  One less blacksmith to compete with!  And your right, you can find banded armor
ygData.messageBody:
> From: patrick.r.baxter@...
>
> Money is such a small part of this game it is pathetic. The only thing
you
> need money for is buy spells and some raw materials. Most things that can
> be made with trade skills (particularly blacksmithing) can be found in the
> game world on monsters and are way better.
>
> I have done smithing, and I would much rather spend my time out in the
world
> of norrath fighting evil and gaining off of that, then sitting at the
local
> forge trying to make an extremely boring fortune.

Patrick, I am so glad to hear you say that! One less blacksmith to compete
with! And your right, you can find banded armor all over the place, so why
buy it? Oh, I mean you can find RING armor that is way better... yeah,
that;s what I meant... I think...

Well, in any case, have fun out fighting evil, and don't worry, the rest of
us will take care of all that boring smithing stuff... because after all, we
are all just greedy blacksmiths who want to have millions of plat!


Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
